Speaker: professor
Dialogue: "..when the three planets are in eclipse.."

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: "..the black hole like a door is open... Evil comes ... sowing terror and chaos..." See?  The snake, Billy.  The Ultimate Evil ... make sure you get the snake!

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: And when is this door opening snake act supposed to occur?

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: ..if this is the five..and this the thousand..

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: Every five thousand years..

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: So I have some time..

Speaker: priest
Dialogue: I will take it to them my son.

Speaker: priest
Dialogue: Go with God.. be safe from Evil..

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: "..then arrange the elements of life against the Terror just so.."

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: "..Water..fire..earth..air..four elements around the fifth.."

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: Aziz!  Light!

Speaker: priest
Dialogue: Lord forgive me.. they already know too, much..

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: "..in which all the history of the Universe resides ..all the strength..all the hope..Protect us from Evil.."

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: Father.. it in the most extraordinary thing.. the greatest find in history..can you imagine the implications.

Speaker: priest
Dialogue: Only too well... here you must be parched..

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: I mean look.. it is like a battle plan..

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: Here the Good.. Here the Evil..

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: Here..

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: A weapon against evil.  Amazing!  I am going to be famous.

Speaker: priest
Dialogue: Then let us toast to your fame!  Here Billy..

Speaker: priest
Dialogue: Drink!

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: To fame.. salud..

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: We cannot toast with water.. Billy ! In my sack.. the Grappa!

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: "..this perfect person.. this perfect being.." I do not understand this.. perfect?

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: Where is that boy? Billy!

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: And this divine Light they talk about.. what is Divine light?

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: Aziz light!

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: Better.. this is the most unbelievable thing I have ever seen..

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: ...Uh, yes?

Speaker: priest
Dialogue: Master... He was about to discover everything, but I had the situation under control.

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: Who are you?  Are you Germans?  Sprechen Sie Deutsch?

Speaker: priest
Dialogue: What did I do wrong?

Speaker: kommander
Dialogue: Servant, you and the thousand guards before you... You have done your work well, but we have to recover the elements. War will soon engulf your planet. We must keep them safe.

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: Unbelievable!!!

Speaker: priest
Dialogue: The Fifth Element...

Speaker: kommander
Dialogue: Take them and put them in a safe place.

Speaker: priest
Dialogue: Will the elements be gone now forever from this place?

Speaker: kommander
Dialogue: When mankind comes to its senses. We will return.

Speaker: priest
Dialogue: Knowing mankind as I do, that could take centuries!

Speaker: kommander
Dialogue: Time is of no importance, only life is important.

Speaker: kommander
Dialogue: When EVIL returns so shall we.

Speaker: priest
Dialogue: We will be ready, Lord.

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: Stop.

Speaker: priest
Dialogue: No!!!  Don't!!!

Speaker: clerk
Dialogue: Hurry, Kommander!  The wall's closing!!!

Speaker: kommander
Dialogue: A mission is a mission, Savoia. You'll learn that.

Speaker: kommander
Dialogue: My apologies to General Kroi -- and my wife..

Speaker: staedert
Dialogue: Don't you have anything?  Not even a temperature?

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: The thermo-analyzers have jammed. One of them reads over a million degrees, the other's at minus 5000... Never seen anything like it.

Speaker: technician
Dialogue: It's taking shape.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: What the hell can it be?

Speaker: technician
Dialogue: Hook-up with the president in one minute, General.

Speaker: staedert
Dialogue: ...Send out a probe.

Speaker: aide
Dialogue: On air in 30 seconds.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: President on line sir..

Speaker: staedert
Dialogue: I can hear you, Mr. President, but I can't see you .

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Is that better?

Speaker: staedert
Dialogue: Perfect, Mr. President.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: I have to address the Supreme Council in 10 minutes. Just the facts, General.

Speaker: staedert
Dialogue: There are no results from the chemical and molecular analysis as of yet, all the calibers are overshot..we're hoping a thermo nucleatic imaging..

Speaker: president
Dialogue: What you are saying is you don't know what this..thing..is.

Speaker: staedert
Dialogue: Not yet Sir..The only thing we know is it just keeps getting bigger!

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Options.

Speaker: staedert
Dialogue: Wait or act.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Recommendations.

Speaker: staedert
Dialogue: My philosophy Mr. President is shoot first ask questions later. I don't like uninvited guests.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Gentlemen?

Speaker: head chemists
Dialogue: I think it would be foolish to shoot at an organism that seems alive, without first taking the time to study it more! Besides, it has shown no signs of hostility.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: No... it's just getting bigger.

Speaker: head chemists
Dialogue: So do people, but that's no reason to shoot them.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: I suppose General Staedert's "philosophy" is acceptable to you?

Speaker: president
Dialogue: All right, then! Staedert?

Speaker: president
Dialogue: ...Yes?

Speaker: priest
Dialogue: Cornelius, Vito Cornelius. 50th level parish. I have a different theory to offer you, Mr. President.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: I'm listening.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Imagine for a moment that this. thing is not anything that can be identified because it prefers not to be, because it is the antithesis of all we are. Because it is evil.. TOTAL EVIL.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: One more reason to shoot first eh?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Evil begets evil, Mr. President. Shooting would only make it stronger.

Speaker: technician
Dialogue: The probe will attain its objective in five seconds.

Speaker: staedert
Dialogue: Mr. President, we're at crisis point.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Your theory is interesting Father but I don't think we have time to go into it right now!

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Time is of no importance, Mr. President. Only life is important.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: That's exactly what we are going to try and do: Protect the lives of some 200 billion of our fellow citizens! General? You may fire when ready.

Speaker: staedert
Dialogue: ..Up front loading of a 120 ZZR missile. Marker lights on the objective.

Speaker: scientist
Dialogue: Its structure has just solidified on the surface, as if the object felt something.  If that's the case, we are undoubtedly dealing with an intelligence.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: The most terrible intelligence imaginable, Mr. President.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: ...The ship is in combat formation. The missile is loaded, General.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Staedert?  Give me a minute... I have a doubt.

Speaker: staedert
Dialogue: I don't, Mr. President.

Speaker: staedert
Dialogue: Load a series of 740 missiles. Maximum shield protection.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Yes, Sir.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Staedert?  What's going on?  Did you destroy it?

Speaker: staedert
Dialogue: I'm about to, Mr. President.

Speaker: scientist
Dialogue: The planet's diameter has greatly increased and it's moving toward the ship.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Staedert?  Get out of there immediately! I don't want an incident, do you hear me, Staedert?

Speaker: staedert
Dialogue: ...What do we have that's bigger than 240?

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Nothing, General.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Staedert, get out of there!  That's an order!

Speaker: staedert
Dialogue: ... Good God!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I'm coming.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Yeah?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I was talking to the cat.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: At least, the cat comes back.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I don't want a million - I just want one.  A perfect one.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I just found a picture of you.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Like shit.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I don't need one.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Finger!  I'm driving a cab now, not a space fighter!!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Uh... at least fifty.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Cheers!

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: We have forty-eight hours, the time it needs to adapt itself to our living conditions.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: And then?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: And then it will be too late. The goal of evil is to wipe out life! All forms of life. For all eternity...Life upsets it.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Is there anything that can stop it?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Yes..thank God..

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: The Mondoshawans don't belong to the Federated Territories, but they are peaceful... in their possession are the four elements of life. These elements when they are gathered around a fifth: The Supreme Being, ultimate warrior, created to protect life......

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: ..will produce what the ancients called the light of creation, the light of total goodness which is the only thing that can defeat EVIL.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: But what happens if instead of this... Ultimate Warrior... it is EVIL who stands here?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: White turns to black.  Light to Dark. Life to Death.  For all eternity.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Sir, we have a Mondoshawan spaceship at the frontier requesting permission to enter our territory.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: I guess I should make a decision..

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: They are the only ones who can help..

Speaker: general
Dialogue: Sir..the Mondoshawan do not belong to the federation. We do not know their intention.. I must recommend a full trinuclear assault..

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Did you see that..thing..swallow our battleship like a gum drop?  You can't even tell me what it is! I ask you for options you give me bullshit. Give them permission to enter our territories with my warmest regards.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Thank you, Mr. President.

Speaker: first officer
Dialogue: Two non-identified ships approaching.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Must be the welcoming committee.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: We've been hit! General alert!!!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: We're losing control! We have to land fast!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Send out a distress signal!!! Activate the emergency landing procedure!

Speaker: first officer
Dialogue: Impact in less than ten seconds!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Time is of no importance...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Don't watch it all day, it'll rot your mind. Bye sweetie..

Speaker: mugger
Dialogue: The cash man!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Been here long?

Speaker: mugger
Dialogue: Don't fuck with me man or I'll blow you into tomorrow!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Isn't that a Z140? Alleviated titanium. Neuro charged assault model?

Speaker: mugger
Dialogue: Uh..

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: You know you could hurt someone with this puppy..good thing it's not loaded..

Speaker: mugger
Dialogue: It's not?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: You gotta push the little yellow button...

Speaker: mugger
Dialogue: Thanks..

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: You're welcome..

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: ..you know these things are VERY illegal.. you could get in a shit load of trouble.. I better hang onto it for you..

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: Please enter your license..

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: Welcome on board Mr. Dallas..

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: How you doing this morning?  Sleep OK? I didn't.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I had the worst goddamn nightmare.

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: You have nine points left on your license..

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Thanks for reminding me..

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: Have a nice day..

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Right..

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: We are lost!

Speaker: general munro
Dialogue: Mr. President, the attack was launched by two unregistered warships.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Close all borders and declare a state of general alert.

Speaker: general munro
Dialogue: Yes, sir.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Try to contact these Mondoshawans.  We owe them an explanation.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: What are we going to do?

Speaker: president
Dialogue: This is government business now. You ought to go home and get some rest, Father.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: I promise to keep you informed.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: ...Has the rescue team found any survivors?

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: This is all that survived?

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: Actually only one cell survived..

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Have you identified it?

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: It's not that easy..we've never encountered anything like it before..you see normal human beings have 40 DNA memo groums..which is more than enough for any species to perpetuate

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Talk English Doc.

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: This cell is like a huge library. It has infinite genetic knowledge stored inside. Almost like it was...engineered.

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Sounds like a freak of nature to me.

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: Yes... I can't wait to meet him.

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: The compositional elements of his DNA chain are the same as ours, there are simply more of them tightly packed. His knowledge is probably limitless..

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Is there any danger? Some kind of virus?

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: We put it through the cellular hygiene detector. The cell is for lack of a better word... perfect.

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: OK, go ahead! But Mr. Perfect better be polite... otherwise I turn him into cat food.

Speaker: doctor
Dialogue: Three seconds to ultra-violet protection.

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: ...This is the crucial phase, The reconstruction of pigment. Cells are bombarded with slightly greasy solar atoms which forces the body cells to react, to protect themselves. That means growing skin. Clever, eh?

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Wonderful!

Speaker: assistant
Dialogue: ... End of reconstruction, beginning of reanimation .

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: Activate life support system.

Speaker: assistant
Dialogue: Life support system activated.

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: Remove the shield.

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: I told you ... perfect!

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: ...I'd, uh , like to get a few pictures for the archives before she wakes up.

Speaker: girl
Dialogue: Ouacra cocha o dayodomo binay ouacra mo cocha ferji akba ligounai makta keratapla. Tokemata tokemata!  Seno santonoi-aypa! Minoi ay Cheba!  Givomana seno!

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: What's she saying?

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: Activate the phonic detector.

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: And give her a light sedative... and something to wear!

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: This thing solid?

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: An elephant couldn't crack it.

Speaker: girl
Dialogue: Teno akta chataman assin-omekta!

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: You're gonna have to learn to communicate better than that angel if you want out.

Speaker: chief
Dialogue: Get me a chair or a stepladder The rest of you go through the main ventilation!

Speaker: chief
Dialogue: Go on follow her!

Speaker: cop
Dialogue: ...No way.

Speaker: cop
Dialogue: Christ! She dove off!

Speaker: girl
Dialogue: Akina delutan, nou-shan.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: ...'Scuse me?

Speaker: cop
Dialogue: You have an unauthorized passenger in your vehicle.  We are going to arrest her. Please leave your hands on the wheel. Thank you for your cooperation.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Sorry, Hon, but I only got one point left on my license and I gotta get to the garage!

Speaker: girl
Dialogue: Please... HELP...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Don't put me in this position... I can't... I'm late as it is...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Finger's gonna kill me.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I hate when people cry... I got no defense...

Speaker: girl
Dialogue: Daya deo dono Dato.  Dalutan!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: It there's one thing I don't need advice on, it's how to drive.

Speaker: cop
Dialogue: Shit! Attention all-patrol cars!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: We'll wait till things quiet down a bit. You mind?

Speaker: girl
Dialogue: ...Priest...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: You're not that bad... Come on we'll get you to a doctor.

Speaker: girl
Dialogue: Vito... Cor... Ni-lious... Priest...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Vito Cornelius?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Excuse me, I'm looking for a priest.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Weddings are one floor down. Congratulations.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: She's not my bride, she's my fare. She's looking for this Vito Cornelius. According to the phone guide he lives here.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: That's me.  But I don't know who she is... where did you find her?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: She dropped in on me... holding this.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: The fifth element.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Finger's gonna kill me...

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Who are you?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I brought the girl remember?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: The girl?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Yeah! She dropped in on me. I mean on my taxi... talking... this... this bizarre language...

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: He's a she!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: You noticed...

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: There's not a moment to lose! Wake her up, but be gentle about it!  This woman is mankind's most precious possession! She is... perfect!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: So you do know her.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Uh yes, we're cousins..distant cousins..

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Perfect...

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: It's a miracle!!!

Speaker: david
Dialogue: What is?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: I can't wear these clothes! This calls for dignity! I have to dress the part!

Speaker: girl
Dialogue: Eto Akta Gamat!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I'm sorry, it's just that... I was told to wake you up gently, so I figured...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: You're right, I was wrong! I shouldn't have kissed you... especially since we haven't been introduced and...  Here, it's a bit late, but... my name is Korben, Korben Dallas. Keep it, you never know, maybe... you'll need a cab one day.  I'll be happy to open the door this time!.

Speaker: david
Dialogue: Father, will you please explain what's going on?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: The Supreme Being, the fifth element is here, in our parish!!! It's a miracle!!!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: ...What's your name?

Speaker: girl
Dialogue: Leeloo Minai Lekarariba-Laminai-Tchai Ekbat De Sebat.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Hey,  that's... cute... Do you have a nickname, something a little... shorter?

Speaker: girl
Dialogue: ...Leeloo.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: That's... really cute...

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Appipulai Leeloo Minai..

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Corn-i-Lius?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: At your service.

Speaker: david
Dialogue: Father.  You sure she's the Supreme Being?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Absolutely sure There's the triple suns on her gloves!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: They all like this in your family, father?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: She's an exception..

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Thank you so much for your help Mr...?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Dallas. Korben Dallas.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Yes. That's fine! Thank you very much. A thousand times over!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I might call to check up on her, you know... to see if she's better?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: She's fine, really..don't you worry.. just needs some rest..she's had a very long trip.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I know. I was there when she arrived.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Excuse me! Just one thing!  She said something to me a while ago and... I don't really get it... Akta Gamat?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: It means, "Never without my permission".

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: That's what I thought.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: ...Thanks.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Evening...

Speaker: neighbor
Dialogue: Fuck you!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: ...Thanks... You, too.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Oh god. I forgot your food ... I'm really sorry! How about a nice Thai nosh to apologize? How does that sound, huh?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Hello?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Finger..man..I'm sorry..listen..I was on the way over but I had a fare fall into my lap.. y'know one of those big fares you just can't resist..

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: 5'7", green eyes... long legs... great skin... perfect..

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Leeloo..

Speaker: david
Dialogue: What's she doing?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Learning our history! The last 5000 years that she missed! She's been out of circulation a while, you know.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: What're you laughing about?

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Napoleon... small.

Speaker: david
Dialogue: Uh father, I know she's been through a lot... but the sacred stones..we don't have much time..

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Yes. Of course..

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Leeloo..I'm sorry to interrupt you but..

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: The case..with the stones... Where is it?

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: San Agamat chay bet... envolet!

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: The case was stolen?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Who in gods name would do such a thing?

Speaker: right arm
Dialogue: Excuse me sir, the council is worried about the economy heating up.  They wondered if

Speaker: right arm
Dialogue: But... 500 is all they need, sir.

Speaker: right arm
Dialogue: 1000! Fine, sir! Sorry to have disturbed you.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: There was this guy with a limp who came a month ago..said he was an art dealer ... Asking all these questions about the Sacred Stones..at the time I didn't think anything of it.. What was his name? I'm so bad with names...

Speaker: david
Dialogue: I didn't know your size.

Speaker: david
Dialogue: They really made her...

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Perfect.

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Domo danko!

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Leeloo?  The Stones... We must get them back.

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Ikset-kiba.  Me imanetaba oum dalat!

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: You know exactly where they are!

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Aknot?  Is that you?

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: ...What an ugly face! Doesn't suit you at all! Take it off...

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: That's better! Never be ashamed of who you are... You're warriors... be proud...

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: So what if the Federal Army crushed your entire race and scattered your people to the wind... Your time for revenge is at hand...

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: ...It's light... the handle's adjustable for easy carrying... good for righties and lefties.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: ... Breaks down into four parts, undetectable by X-rays.. It's the ideal weapon for quick, discreet interventions.  A word on fire power: Titanium recharger. 3000 round clip with bursts of 3 to 300. With the replay button, another Zorg innovation, it's even easier... one shot.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: ... and replay sends every following shot to the same location...

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: I recharge, but the enemy has launched a cowardly sneak attack from behind, the automirror takes care of that.  Gives me the time to turn around and finish the job. 300 round bursts, then there are the Zorg oldies...

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: ...Rocket launcher.  The always efficient flame thrower... My favorite. Our famous net launcher, the arrow launcher, with exploding or poisonous gas heads - very practical. And for the grand finale, the all-new ice-cube system!

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: ...Four full crates, delivered right on time! What about you, my dear Aknot, did you bring me what I asked you for?

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: ...Magnificent.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: What do you mean empty?

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Alright..I've got an open mind here.. anyone care to explain?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: She says that the Guardians never really had much faith in humans. They were afraid of being attacked. The stones were given to someone they could trust who took another route. She's supposed to contact this person in a little less than twelve hours from now in a hotel. She's looking for the address!

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Dot!

Speaker: david
Dialogue: Planet Fhloston, in the Angel constellation

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: ...We're saved!

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: I'm fucked!

Speaker: aknot
Dialogue: You asked for a case. We brought you a case.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: A case with four stones in it. Not one! Not two or three! But four!!! Four stones!!! What the fuck am I supposed to do with an EMPTY case?!!

Speaker: aknot
Dialogue: ...We are warriors, not merchants!

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: But you can still count.  Look... my fingers.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: ...Four stones, four crates... Zero stones...  Put everything back, we're outta here.

Speaker: aknot
Dialogue: We risked our lives. I believe a little compensation is in order.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Leave them one crate.  For the cause!

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: I don't like warriors!  They're too narrow-minded, no sublety.  Worse, they fight for hopeless causes..for honor! Honor has killed millions of people but hasn't saved a single one.  You know what -- do I like though, I like killer. A real dyed in the wool killer.  Cold-blooded. Clean.  Methodical.  Thorough.  A killer, when he picked up the ZF1, would've immediately asked about the little red button on the bottom of the gun.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Bring the priest.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: So you forgive me?

Speaker: thai
Dialogue: Not going to open?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I've never gotten a message that wasn't bad news.

Speaker: thai
Dialogue: How someone strong like you scared from a message? Is good news I sure!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: The last two messages I got?  The first one was from my wife telling me she was leaving! And the second was from my lawyer telling me he was leaving too... with my wife.

Speaker: thai
Dialogue: You right that is bad.. but mathematically luck must change! Grandfather say: "It never rain every day." This is good news guarantee.. I bet you lunch!

Speaker: thai
Dialogue: ...You're fired. Oh!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: At least I won lunch.

Speaker: thai
Dialogue: Good philosophy..see good in bad.. I like..I prepare number one dessert.. special for you and pussy..

Speaker: david
Dialogue: I got it!  Everything  here we need to know about Fhloston Paradise Hotel... and a detailed blueprint of the entire hotel!

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Good work, my son.  Now all we need is a way to get there.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: I'll get it.  Finish your work my son.

Speaker: right arm
Dialogue: Father Cornelius?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: My son?

Speaker: right arm
Dialogue: Mr. Zorg would like a word with you.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Mr. Who?

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Zorg. Jean-Baptiste Emmanuel Zorg... nice to see you again

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: I remember you now..the so called art dealer.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: I'm glad you got your memory back, Father... Because you're going to need it... Where are the stones?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: ...Why on earth do the stones interest you?

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Personally, they are of no interest to me, I'd rather sell weapons..but I have a customer... so tell me...

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Even it I did know where the stones were I would never tell somebody like you.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Why?  What's wrong with me?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: ...I'm a priest! I'm here to serve life, All you want to do is destroy it.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Ah, Father... You are so wrong. Let me explain...

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: ...would you like a drink?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: No thank you.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Follow me.. Life, which you so nobly serve, comes from destruction. Look at this empty glass.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Here it is... peaceful... serene... but if it is...

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Destroyed...

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: ...Look at all these little things... so busy all of a sudden. Notice how each one is useful. What a lovely ballet, so full of form and color.  So full of..life!

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: They are robots!

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Yes but... by that simple gesture of destruction. I gave work to at least fifty people today. The engineers, the technicians, the mechanics. Fifty people who will be able to feed their children so they can grow up big and strong.  Children who will have children of their own, adding to the great cycle of life!

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Father, by creating a little destruction, I am, in fact, encouraging life!  So, in reality, you and I are in the same business!

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Destroying a glass is one thing..killing people with the weapons you produce is quite another.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Let me reassure you Father..I will never kill more people in my entire life than religion has killed in the last 2000 years.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Where's the robot to pat your back?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Can I give you a hand?

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: You saved my life... So, I'm going to spare yours.  Throw him out!

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: You are a monster, Zorg!

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: I know...

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: ...Torture whoever you want, the president if you have to but I want those Stones. You have an hour.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: It's gobbling up all the communication satellites in the galaxy!

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Why the hell is it eating up all those satellites like that?

Speaker: head scientist
Dialogue: ...We're working on it, Mr. President. We're working on it.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: It should only choke on them.

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: I managed to contact the Mondoshawan. They deplore the incident, but accept our apologies.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: And the Stones?  Did you find them in the wreckage?

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: The-Stones weren't aboard the ship.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: ...What do you mean?

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: The Mondoshawan never fully trusted the human race..they felt we're too unpredictable.. so they gave up the Stones to somebody they do trust. Her name is Plavalaguna. She's a Diva and she's going to sing at the charity ball on Fhloston Paradise in a few hours.  She has the Stones with her.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Excellent!

Speaker: president
Dialogue: I want your best man on this!

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Don't worry, Sir. I have the perfect one.

Speaker: thai
Dialogue: Stewed jellyfish cake.. my speciality..

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Saved by the bell.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: ...Hello?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Hi Ma...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Yes ma..

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Go on... This is gonna take a while!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Other than that... You all right?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I'm coming!. Ma, what're you talking about?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: All I want is an explanation! I just got in, I lost my job. I smashed my cab. I got mugged, but other than that everything's peachy, Ma, thanks for asking!! Now settle down and explain to me calmly..

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Ma. If I'd won, I'd know about it. Someone would have notified me.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Ma.. it's the door. I'll call you back.

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Major Dallas, if our calculations are correct you still have 57 hours owed to the Federal Army on your enlistment which is more than you will need for a mission of the utmost importance.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: What mission?

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: To save the world.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Where have I heard this song before?

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: You're to leave immediately for Fhloston Paradise. Retrieve four Stones from the Diva Plavalaguna. And bring them back with the utmost discretion as possible. Any questions'?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Just one... why me?

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Three reasons... One: As part of The Elite Special Forces Unit of the Federated Army you are an expert in the use of all weapons and spacecraft needed for this mission.

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Two: Of all the members of your unit you were the most highly decorated.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: And the third one?

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: You're the only one left alive...

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Don't you open your messages?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I've had enough good news for today

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: You have won the annual Gemini contest and a trip to Fhloston Paradise. For two. Congratulations. Here are your tickets.

Dialogue: You rigged the contest?

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Major Iceborg will accompany you... as your wife...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: You couldn't come up with something a little more discreet?

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Old tricks are the best tricks eh?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I'm not going.

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Why not?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: One reason... I want to stay the only one left alive.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: ...Scuse me.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: ...Shit!

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: What is it?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: It's my wife.

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: I thought you were divorced.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I mean my future.. my ex.. My future ex.. if she sees you here I'm finished.  She hates you guys. It's what killed us in the first place. Please...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: ...Sorry, General, but we've got no choice! It'll only take a minute! Let me set up another meeting and I'll be back.

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Three of us will never fit in there!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Oh, yes you will...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: ...Coming!

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Apipoulai!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I suppose that means "Hi" ?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: I'm sorry to have to resort to such methods, but we heard about your good luck on he radio and we need the tickets to Fhloston.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Is that the usual way priests go on vacation?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: We're not going on vacation..we're on a mission..

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: What kind of mission?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: We have to save the world.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Good luck..

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Of course.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Father, I was in the Army for awhile and every time they told us we were on a mission to save the world the only thing that changed was I lost a lot of friends. So thanks for the offer.. but no thanks.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I'm sorry..

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: This is a police control action..

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: This is not an exercise. This is a police control.

Dialogue: Oh my god oh my god..

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Leeloo, hide in here and don't move!

Dialogue: What are you doing?

Dialogue: ...Spread your legs and place your hands in the yellow circles, please.

Dialogue: Put your hands in the yellow circles, please.

Dialogue: Sir? Are you a human?

Dialogue: No, I'm a meat popsicle.

Dialogue: Sir, this is a control.  Please put your hands in the yellow circles.

Dialogue: Fuck you!!

Dialogue: Wrong answer.

Dialogue: Glad to help.

Dialogue: They just arrested the guy for Uranium smuggling. Everything's going as planned.

Dialogue: All I have to do now is to go to the airport and take his place.  I should be in Fhloston in less than four hours.

Dialogue: Don't come back without the Stones.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I'm really sorry.. there wasn't time.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Here let me wrap you up.

Dialogue: ..It's funny.  I've met you twice today  and you've ended up in my arms both times.

Dialogue: Valo massa... Chacha hamas.

Dialogue: Uh..you're welcome.

Dialogue: Coffee!  That's what you need! A nice, hot cup of coffee!

Dialogue: With some honey!  You'll see, honey's great!...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: A hot cup of coffee... with honey...

Dialogue: I've got this great honey somewhere. You know about honey?  There used to be these little animals who made it with antenna...

Dialogue: I forget which ate it and which made it but..

Dialogue: Here it is!

Dialogue: Taste this...

Dialogue: It... melts in your mouth, doesn't it?

Dialogue: You hear that?

Dialogue: Cornelius..

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Oh god!

Dialogue: I'm really sorry.. let me help you..

Dialogue: Achta ge lumitai de matala..

Dialogue: What?

Dialogue: Vano da, mechteba?! Soun domo kala chon hammas!

Dialogue: Korben Dallas!  We got him.

Dialogue: Perfect... Take command, Akanit. Go to Fhloston and get the Stones... If Zorg really wants them... He'll have to negotiate.  Revenge is at hand.

Dialogue: I'll take the mission.

Dialogue: Akta dedero ansila do mektet.

Dialogue: I can't pretend to be your husband... David's in great shape.

Dialogue: Uh... yeah.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Excuse me.  I was so afraid I'd miss the flight that I sent the kid here to pick up my boarding card.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: ...My cousin David...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Uh, yes... Newlyweds.  You know how it is... Love at first sight. You meet, something goes tilt,. you get married, you hardly know each other. Right, darling?

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Dinoine chagantakat!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Took the words right out of my mouth. Go on... I'll be right with you.  It's our honeymoon. We're going to use the trip to get to know each other better.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: I feel so guilty sending her to do the dirty work. I know she was made to be strong but she's also so fragile... So human. You know what I mean?

Dialogue: We'll be right back ... we're gonna check out the duty free...

Dialogue: Yeah...

Dialogue: Where's Leeloo?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: It's all my fault.  I'm the servant... It's my mission! Here!

Dialogue: Here's the key to the Temple.. Prepare for our arrival!

Dialogue: Tell Aknot plan A flopped. Tell him to go to plan B.

Dialogue: ...Send in a back-up unit, Zone 7!

Dialogue: You are so lucky... Loc Rhod is the coolest DJ in the universe.

Dialogue: Listen... I don't want to be interviewed. I'd prefer to remain anonymous.

Dialogue: Forget anonymous.  You'll be doing Loc Rhod's live show every day from 5 to 7!

Dialogue: You gotta be kidding!

Dialogue: ...The right size, right build, right hair.  Right on! Say something-to those 50 billion pair of ears out there D-man!

Dialogue: Does it get any better or what!

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: ...Quiver ladies, he's gonna set the world on fire right here from 5 to 7! You'll know everything there is to know about the D-man. His dreams, his desires, his most intimate of intimates.  And from what I'm looking at intimate is the stud muffin's middle name. So tell me my main man... you nervous in the service?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Uh... not really.

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Freeze those knees, my chickadees, 'cause Korben is on the case with a major face...

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: ...Start drooling, ladies! My man here is a sharp-tongued Sire who's gonna stroke your every desire.

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Yesterday's unknown will be tomorrow's Prince of Fhloston Paradise, the hotel of a thousand and one follies, home of luxury and beauty.  A magic fountain flowing with non-stop wine, women and Bootchie Koochie Koo...

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Beware out there puppy dogs my man is on the prowl. Owwww!

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: ...And start licking your stamps little girls, this guy's gonna have you writing home to Momma! Tomorrow from 5 to 7, I'll be your voice, your tongue and I'll be hot on the tail of the sexiest man of the year... D-man... Your man... My man.

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Korben sweetheart do me a favor I know this is probably the biggest thing that ever happened to you in your inconsequential life. But I've got a show to do here and it's got to pop. So tomorrow, when we're on air, give me a hand... Try to make believe you have more than a one word vocabulary. OK pal?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I didn't come here to play Dumbo on the radio. So tomorrow between 5 and 7 give yourself a hand, that clear pal?

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Crystal.

Speaker: right arm
Dialogue: That's right.

Speaker: right arm
Dialogue: That's impossible!  He's in j... I mean, there must be some mistake. I have my ticket! I'm the real Korben Dallas!

Speaker: right arm
Dialogue: I want to see your boss!  Get rid of this fucking window! Somebody's made a mistake, goddamnit!

Speaker: right arm
Dialogue: Sorry, my fault... Just a little overexcited... that's all... I'm calm now.

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Apipoulai!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Not hard to find you...just follow the Chaos...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Leeloo, listen to me... these tickets... they're not mine... I mean they are, but not for vacation like everyone thinks... I'm on an operation... and if I didn't come get you, you'd be in a shitload of trouble... I'd love to be on vacation with you... but now.... now I've got to work... And Leeloo... I would love to work in peace.

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Love...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Yes! But "love" isn't the operative word here, PEACE is!

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Peace... and love...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Sometimes you can't learn everything from a screen..sometimes it's better to ask someone who has experience..

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: What is... Make Love?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Know what? On that subject maybe you'd be better off asking the screen.

Dialogue: OK! Finished!

Dialogue: Finished what?

Dialogue: Learning language.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Which one?

Dialogue: You learned 900 languages in five minutes?!

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Yes! Now it's your turn! I learned your language, you have to learn mine!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I know how to say "Hello". Teach me how to say "Good-bye", that's all I need.

Dialogue: Apipoussan!

Dialogue: Apipoussan?

Dialogue: Good! Do you know how we say "make love"?

Dialogue: ...Hoppi-hoppa.

Dialogue: Help...

Dialogue: Sweet dreams, Mr. Dallas!

Dialogue: I don't want an individual position, I want all positions!

Dialogue: We're going to take off soon, Mr. Rhod!

Dialogue: Now you're talking!

Dialogue: Molecular axis authorization. Vector 130. Destination Fhloston.

Dialogue: Thanks, Miss.

Dialogue: Tell the ground crew we've got parasites in the landing gear.

Dialogue: Yeah, it's me... Put Zorg on.

Dialogue: I'm listening.

Dialogue: The real Korben Dallas is on the plane! He took my place.

Dialogue: This is a joke, right?

Dialogue: No!! I swear to God! I've never been this sincere with a human before!

Dialogue: Everything ready for liftoff?

Dialogue: No, no... I'm not ready! I'd like to talk first...

Dialogue: I cannot hear you. We have a bad connection here.  What's your number?

Dialogue: I'll call you back.

Dialogue: Anti static pressure?

Dialogue: Power increase.

Dialogue: Liftoff.

Dialogue: Landing gear secure.  Let's light one up.

Dialogue: All right! We're finally getting something!

Dialogue: The thing is sending out radio wavelengths!

Dialogue: ...Probably wants to make a call!

Dialogue: Yes... Zorg here.

Dialogue: Am I disturbing you?

Dialogue: No... not at all.  Where are you?

Dialogue: ...Not far, now.

Dialogue: Got it.

Dialogue: How's our deal coming along?

Dialogue: Fine, just fine!  I'll have the 4 pieces you asked for any time now.  But it wasn't easy. My costs have tripled.

Dialogue: The Stones will be here. I'll see to it personally!

Dialogue: ...I can't wait to be among you.

Dialogue: I wanted to tell you that...

Dialogue: Docking activated. You can let the passengers out.

Dialogue: Pardon me.  Excuse me. I'm trying to reach my wife.. Sorry!

Dialogue: Welcome to Paradise.

Dialogue: If you don't have the code you can't open it!

Dialogue: My main man! Please don't leave me here alone. My head's killing me and my adoring fans are gonna tear me apart! Get me outta here!

Dialogue: I'll take you to the bar, after that, you're on your own.

Dialogue: Oh, yes! Do that! You treat me right, man. Tell me all about yourself, your roots, your personal life, your childhood dreams...

Dialogue: I don't think this is a good time...

Dialogue: ...You got brothers and sisters? What about your dad? Tell me about your dad! What was he like? Physically? Big, I suppose?

Dialogue: Yeah, very big, a giant.

Dialogue: I didn't have a dad... never saw him... never even heard him. 50 billion people listen to me every day... and he doesn't hear me...

Dialogue: Yes... you know there's a lot of differences between men women.

Dialogue: You noticed..

Dialogue: I'm going to see the Diva sing. What's the matter?... Do I look bad?

Dialogue: Do you know how this works?

Dialogue: It's difficult.

Dialogue: Army issue. I'm sorry.

Dialogue: You're nothing but a... a...

Dialogue: Hey Stud we gotta...

Dialogue: Korben my man what's happening here? Who's the chick? What's the gig? We free forming here? Getting funky with the monkey? Can I get in on this?

Dialogue: We have just walked into what is probably the most beautiful concert hall in the universe. Totally awesome! Magnificent paintings on the ceiling. Dialogue: ...to who?

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: ...And over there is the Emperor Kodar Japhet whose daughter Aachen is still at the bar. "I love to sing, too, but in the shower", she recently confessed to me. She will no doubt prove to be as generous tonight as she always is.

Dialogue: It's showtime!

Speaker: manager
Dialogue: Yeah!?

Speaker: manager
Dialogue: She's allergic to flowers!!!

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: ...My God!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Commander, I have a ship with a main malfunction. He requests permission to dock for repairs.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: Did you check out his registration number?

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Everything's in order.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: Put him in the docking garage and inform the police.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: More than enough.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Mangalores! The Diva's suite! They want the Sacred Stones! They must be stopped. We must stop them!. I'm going to free you but you must promise to help me!

Speaker: mangalore
Dialogue: I have it.

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Apipoulai!

Speaker: mangalore
Dialogue: They were waiting for us! It was an ambush!

Speaker: akanit
Dialogue: If it's war they want it's war they'll get! Enact the Final Plan!

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: My compliments, little lady! ...And thanks for doing all the dirty work! I couldn't have done it any better myself!  ...Now hand over the Stones!

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Nice knowing you.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: You can run but you can't hide...

Speaker: akanit
Dialogue: Nobody move! We're taking over this ship!

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: I told you...

Speaker: mangalore 1
Dialogue: Everyone down!

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Ladies and gentlemen, I think we're being... attacked.  The place is crawling with warriors.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: You want something done, do it yourself!

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: They're hideous. They've got a crest on the head, the eyes of a toad and fingers all over their hands. Totally hideous!

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: ...Mangalores!

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Send a battalion out immediately!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I was sent by the government to help you.

Speaker: diva
Dialogue: Don't worry.  This is my fate... How was the concert?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I've never heard anything so beautiful in my life.

Speaker: diva
Dialogue: You're a good man... She was right to have chosen you...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Who?

Speaker: diva
Dialogue: The Fifth Element... The Supreme Being... Your wife...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Leeloo... is... she's...

Speaker: diva
Dialogue: Yes, and more than that... You must give her the Stones, she's the only one who knows how to use them.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: ...So Cornelius was telling the truth!

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Of course I was telling you the truth!... If you had listened to me in the first place, we wouldn't be in this predicament now!

Speaker: diva
Dialogue: She needs you. She needs your help and your love. She's more fragile than she seems...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: ...Yeah, so am I.

Speaker: diva
Dialogue: She was taught to love the life of others... but not her own. You have to teach her to love if you want her to truly live!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I'll help her, I promise, but I think you should tell me where the Stones are!

Speaker: diva
Dialogue: Do you love her?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I... I don't know! We hardly know each other... it takes time!

Speaker: diva
Dialogue: I don't have time... I need to know.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Listen, the last time I admitted to a woman I loved her ... I never saw her again.

Speaker: diva
Dialogue: I would like to have died in peace...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: You tell me to save the world then you go off and leave me in the shit!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Come on! You're not gonna die in peace! You're not going to die at all! You hear me? Where are the Stones?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I'm sorry, but... the Stones...

Speaker: diva
Dialogue: They are... with me...

Speaker: mangalore 2
Dialogue: Stay calm and nobody will get hurt! Hands on your head and into the hall!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: ...The Stones are with me?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: ...In me?

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Don't you think we'd better be going?

Speaker: mangalore
Dialogue: Hey, you! With the others!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: That's it... I've had... all day people have been sticking guns in my face...

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Korben man... These dudes are going to waste us if we don't do what they say.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: You don't do what I say... I'll waste you myself. Got it?

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Got it...

Speaker: akanit
Dialogue: What's the situation in the hall?

Speaker: mugger
Dialogue: There's no more resistance. Everything's under control.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Everybody down!

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: This is amazing! Korben, Korben Dallas, the winner of the Gemini Croquette contest just killed three warriors like he was swatting flies...

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: It's Roy von Bacon, the Lions center forward joining in the battle...

Speaker: princess aachen
Dialogue: All this is terribly exciting, hmmm?

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: GET OFF MY BACK!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Toss me the balls!

Speaker: baby ray
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: The balls for Christ's sake!

Speaker: emperor japhet
Dialogue: He wants the balls! You deaf or something?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: How far is he from here?

Speaker: emperor
Dialogue: I'd say about thirty yards to the left.

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: ...And our man Korben has literally knocked out the opposition with an amazing 90 foot pitch.

Speaker: fog
Dialogue: Thanks for your help.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Forget it.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Leeloo???

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Kor... ban...

Speaker: cop 1
Dialogue: Hey, who are you?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: The winner of the Gemini Croquette contest.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Seven to the left. Five to the right.

Speaker: cop
Dialogue: What's he doing?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Six to the left. One to the right.

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: He's on vacation.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: We got to find the leader. Mangalores don't fight without a leader.

Speaker: akanit
Dialogue: One more shot and we start killing hostages, got that?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Found him...

Speaker: akanit
Dialogue: Send someone to negotiate!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Mind if I go? I'm an excellent negotiator.

Speaker: cop 1
Dialogue: Uh... Sure, go ahead.

Speaker: cop 1
Dialogue: We're sending someone in who's authorized to negotiate.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Anyone else want to negotiate?

Speaker: cop 2
Dialogue: Where'd he learn to negotiate like that?

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: From us!

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: You're probably very angry with me and I quite understand. But I want you to know I'm fighting for a noble cause.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Yeah, I know... to save the world... but right now all I want to do is save Leeloo.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Leeloo's in trouble?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: When is she not in trouble?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Uh.. Have you tried the Diva's suite?

Speaker: policeman
Dialogue: More trouble?

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Nothing I can't fix myself.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Leeloo?

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Korben...

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Korben man... what the hell is this?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: A molecular bomb.

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: And, uh, what're these numbers clicking by?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Probably the time remaining before it explodes.

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: You're just saying that to scare me! Right? If it was a bomb, an alarm would've gone off. There's bomb detectors in all these hotels!

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Maybe we oughta be going, what do you think?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Not without Leeloo.

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Like D-Man, I hate to bother you but uh, like, we're down to 2 minutes here...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: It's the latest model.. I've never seen one before... it works off a magnetic coded card... Let's see if I can rig it up.

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Hey! What are you doing? The bomb!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Don't worry, I'm here now!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Just relax. I've got the Stones. Everything's going to be fine.

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Like Korben, can I have 30 seconds of your time here?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I'll be right back.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Allow me...

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Just for the fun of it.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Well, what do we have here? Is this Korben Dallas? The famous winner of the Gemini Croquette contest? Or is this Korben Dallas from Special Section sent by old Lindberg himself.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: ...In any event, whoever you are, I was glad to meet you.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: ...A 3000 round clip! I didn't fire off 3000 rounds... did I?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Don't you know how to count. It's not all that hard. Watch!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: One! That's for trying to kill me!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Two! That's for firing me! Three! That's for pushing around a priest! And the rest is for what you did to my wife!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: We're outta here!

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Are you nuts, Father? That hurts! I can't feel my teeth.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Doesn't matter all you need are your legs.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: I didn't fire three thousand rounds...

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: You know how to fly this thing?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: It's like a cab isn't it?

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: 30 seconds...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Anyone know how to release the lines on this crate?

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Maximum Protection.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Found it?

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: I don't even know what I'm looking for!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Fuck it! Hold tight!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Solid little jobs, aren't they?

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Dear listeners, your favorite DJ is alive and kicking. It's seven o'clock and time for the news. Tune in tomorrow for another adventure.

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: The best show I ever did!

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: How's that? Can you hear me better now?

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Who gives a shit! I didn't come here to listen to music! Listen up instead of running off at the mouth! The batteries on my phone are almost gone.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Dispatch me another ZFX200 immediately. Someone stole mine.

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: I'm not at the hotel!

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Hello?...

Speaker: zorg
Dialogue: Stay calm.... stay calm...

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Major Dallas has the Five Elements on board. The priest is guiding them directly to the temple.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Thank God! We've been saved!

Speaker: scientist
Dialogue: Mr. President.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Yes? Now, what?

Speaker: president
Dialogue: What do you mean, "its advancing"?!

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: It's not only advancing, but it's moving at incredible speed! We're having trouble following it.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: ...And... Do you have any idea where it's heading?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Apipoulai..

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: I'm so very sad.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Why? We did pretty well, wouldn't you say?

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Five hundred wars... Arms... Drugs... Money... Everything you create is used to destroy...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I told you not to read all that crap!

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Protect life... Until death.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: There's a General on the phone... His name's Mambo, I think.

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Munro here. President Lindberg wants to talk to you.  Hold the line.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Major, first off, I want to thank you, in my name and in the name of the Federation...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: So now what's the problem?

Speaker: president
Dialogue: There's a ball of fire 1,200 miles in diameter heading straight for the earth. And we have no idea how to stop it! ...That's the problem.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: How much time before the collision?

Speaker: scientist
Dialogue: If its speed remains constant... in an hour and 57 minutes.

Speaker: david
Dialogue: You're all safe. Thanks be to God!

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Later, David! Later! There's not a minute to lose!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Excuse me, Father, but... could we pray later?

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: They just landed in the desert.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: How much time is left?

Speaker: scientist
Dialogue: About nine minutes.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Uh, this one... must be water!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Don't tell me you don't know how all this works?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Theoretically, yes! The four Stones form the beam and the Fifth Element is supposed to stand in the middle there, but... I don't have the reference book. I've never seen the Stones work!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Match the symbols!

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: What is this some kinda game? Like chess?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: No. It's much simpler. If we don't figure out where these Stones go in five minutes, we're all dead! Think you got it?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: There's no light! You told me there were supposed to be four beams of light.

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Yes, of course, but... The Stones are shut! They have to be open for it to work.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: And you don't know how they open, is that what you are saying?

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: That's what I'm saying.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Leeloo? The Stones! We have to open them! How does it work?

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: The wind blows... the fire burns...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I know all that, Leeloo! I'm talking about the Stones.

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: ...The rain falls...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: The rain falls... the wind blows?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Try and figure out how this fucking thing opens, instead of staring at me like that!

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: I'm looking, I'm looking.

Speaker: scientist
Dialogue: ...Three minutes.

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: We've lost contact with them.

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: ...we'll never make it.

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: It... it moved! Korben! Korben!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: What did you say? What did you do?

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Nothing! Swear to God, I didn't do nothing!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Look, you did something that set it off. Try to remember. Concentrate. Tell me exactly what you did!!

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: I was like this... With my hands here and... I said, "We'll never make it!" That's all!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Is that all?

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: Yeah... then I sighed... like this.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: The wind! The wind blows...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Quickly, everyone on a Stone! Water for water!  Fire for fire! Earth for earth!

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: I don't have a light.  I stopped smoking last week! If we'd come a bit sooner...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Don't breathe.

Speaker: scientist
Dialogue: Two more minutes.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: It's up to you now, Angel!

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: I'm so tired...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: You can sleep tomorrow... come on...

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: I want to sleep... forever...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Leeloo! Listen to me! I'll take you on a vacation afterwards! A real vacation, this time, for as long as you want. Come on! You can do it!

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Come on Leeloo! Come on!

Speaker: scientist
Dialogue: It'll be entering the atmosphere in one minute.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Leeloo! If you don't get on with the program we're all gonna die! And that's not on my agenda for today.

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: What's the use of saving lives... when you see what you do with them!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: You're right but there are lots of good things... beautiful things...

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: ...Like love...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Exactly.

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: But I don't know love... I'm like a machine programmed to save other people's lives but never to have one of my own.

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: I have thousands of memories but none of them are mine... There is no need for me other than this. I'm immortal but I have no life.

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Yes, you do! I need you. More than you can imagine! Stand up straight!

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Why?... Why would you need me?

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Because...

Speaker: cornelius
Dialogue: Tell her, for God's sake!

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: Because...

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Tell me...

Speaker: korben
Dialogue: I love you...

Speaker: leeloo
Dialogue: Now you're allowed to kiss me.

Speaker: scientist
Dialogue: The planet seems to have stopped at... 62 miles from impact.

Speaker: loc rhod
Dialogue: This guy is a killer with the babes. I knew it from the moment I laid eyes on him.

Speaker: munro
Dialogue: Mr. President, let me introduce you to Professor Mactilburgh, who runs the center.

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: It's an honor to receive you. Mr. President.

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Yes.. Well? Where are our two heroes?

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: They were so tired from their ordeal that we put them in the reactor this morning..

Speaker: president
Dialogue: I have 19 more meetings after this one Professor..

Speaker: professor
Dialogue: Of course.. Let me see if they're revived.

Speaker: aide
Dialogue: We go live in one minute, Mr. President.

Speaker: mactilburgh
Dialogue: I.. uh.. they need five more minutes, Mr. President.

Speaker: aide
Dialogue: No ma'am... I tried... No ma'am...

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Who is it?

Speaker: aide
Dialogue: Some woman... claims she's Korben's mother...

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Give it here...

Speaker: president
Dialogue: Mrs. Dallas, this in the President. On behalf of the entire Federation, I would like to thank...
